file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-81-02-04 - SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the sound-proofing blankets. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - REMOV- 25-81-02-000-801-A EMB-135 AL ACFT MODEL(S) SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - INSTAL- 25-81-02-400-801-A EMB-135 LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 25-81-02 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-81-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the sound-proofing blankets. (2) The sound-proofing blankets are installed to the fuselage structure of the passenger cabin at zones 231 through 234, 241 through 244, 251 through 254, and 261 through 264. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-03-000-801-A/400 OVERHEAD BIN - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-05-000-801-A/400 PSUS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-08-000-801-A/400 ESCAPE-HATCH TRIM SHROUD - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-011-A (1) Remove the headliner, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400). (2) Remove the passenger seats, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-21-01-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the overhead bins, as applicable ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-81-02 Page 2 of 8 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the passenger service units, as applicable ( AMM TASK 25-22-05-000-801-A/ 400). (5) Remove the sidewall lining panels, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-01-000-802-A/ 400). (6) Remove the escape-hatch trim shroud assembly, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-08-000-801-A/400). (7) Remove the skirting lining panels, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-02-000-802-A/ 400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-011-A (1) The procedure to remove the sound-proofing blankets from the passenger cabin ceiling and sidewalls is as follows: (a) Remove the attachment adhesive tapes from the sound-proofing blankets which are installed to the fuselage structure (between frame/bulkhead). Refer to Figure 401, sheet 2, DET. D. (b) Remove the attachment clamps (3) from the sound-proofing blankets (1) which are installed to the fuselage structure (between frames/bulkhead). Refer to Figure 401, sheet 2, DET. E. (c) Remove the sound-proofing blankets installed between the frame/bulkhead and mark them to make their installation easier. Refer to Figure 401, sheet 1, DET. A and sheet 2, DET. C. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-81-02 Page 3 of 8 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-81-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the sound-proofing blankets. (2) The sound-proofing blankets are installed to the fuselage structure at zones 231 through 234, 241 through 244, 251 through 254, and 261 through 264. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-21-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-03-400-801-A/400 OVERHEAD BIN - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-05-400-801-A/400 PSUS - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-23-08-400-801-A/400 ESCAPE-HATCH TRIM SHROUD - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) OT-57CW Polyester Adhesive Tape AR OT-258C Polyether Ether Ketone Pressure-Sensitive Tape AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-81-02 Page 7 of 8 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-011-A CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT NO TOOL IS LEFT IN THE AIRCRAFT AFTER THE INSTALLATION OF THE SOUND-PROOFING BLANKET IS COMPLETED. (1) The procedure for installation of the sound-proofing blankets to the passenger cabin sidewalls and ceiling is as follows: (a) Install the sound-proofing blankets (1) between the frame/bulkhead with the attachment clamps (3). Refer to Figure 401, sheet 2, DET. E and sheet 3. NOTE: • Use attachment adhesive tapes if applicable. • Use the same attachment clamps (3) as you used to install the thermoacoustic insulation pads (2), in the same attachment positions as they were used before. • To make their installation easier, you can snip the folded portion of the sound-proofing blankets (1). Refer to Figure 401, sheet 2, DET. E. (b) After the sound-proofing blankets are installed, finish them off with adhesive tapes. Make sure that there is no clearance between the pads. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-011-A (1) Install the passenger service units, as applicable ( AMM TASK 25-22-05-400-801-A/ 400). (2) Install the overhead bins, as applicable ( AMM TASK 25-22-03-400-801-A/400). (3) Install the headliner, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400). (4) Install the sidewall lining panels, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-01-400-802-A/400). (5) Install the escape-hatch trim shroud assembly, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-08-400-801-A/400). (6) Install the skirting lining panels, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-23-02-400-802-A/400). (7) Install the passenger seats, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-21-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-81-02 Page 8 of 8 Rev 53 - Oct 31/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
